name: Castelia's Might
description:
Castalia's might is a 2d puzzle platformer of sorts with a bit of difficulty .
I wanted to create a game that recreates the old school era where you have to fail many times / think before you move to find the best way of progressing .

It has 7 levels and 2 boss fights , nothing special , they can be easily cheesed if you find out the trick to do so , especially the last boss *wink wink drops hints* lol .

Controls :

WASD | QZSD | ARROW & gamepad .
X (gamepad) | F : interactions .
Esc : menu
The games contains a few hidden easter eggs
If anyone ends up finding the secret menu here's your code : devaccess .

If anyone finds a bug please feel free to report it as i'm willing to fix anything broken in the game for a better experience .

Credits are in-game , if anyone feels like i've used some of their arts and forgot to credit them properly , please let me know 🙏
